entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Periods of rain beginning in the afternoon. Risk of thundershowers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming south 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High 24. Humidex 30. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016
